Once upon a time, in a bright blue sky, there lived a fluffy cloud named Nimbus. Unlike other clouds that loved to soar high, Nimbus was afraid of heights. He watched his friends float joyfully above the mountains, while he hovered timidly just above the treetops. One day, a storm approached, threatening to sweep Nimbus away. Gathering all his courage, he took a deep breath and rose higher than he ever had before. To his surprise, he discovered a breathtaking view and a warm sunbeam that embraced him. From that day on, Nimbus realized that sometimes, facing fears leads to the most beautiful adventures.
